room_title: Escape room "Black & White" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: My husband took me here for date night and we did the "Black & White" room. Our operator, Hannah, was awesome! She was very personable and made the experience so much fun. We escaped with less than 2 minutes on the clock. Thank you for a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Black & White" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We had a great time in the Black and White room! Challenging clues, working together as a team, everyone contributed to get us out! Fun for all ages!

room_title: Escape room "Black & White" by Brainstorm Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Did Area 51 and The Black & White room. We've done a lot of escape rooms all over the US and this was one of the best we've ever done. The games were brilliant! The staff was awesome! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a family night out, date night or any kind of team building event. Loved it!!!
